10600.name: Battle Manual - Soul Barrier
10600.description: Spellbook needed to learn Soul Barrier. Used by Berserkers and Arbalesters. Required level: 58

10601.name: Battle Manual - Lightning Barrier
10601.description: Spellbook needed to learn Lightning Barrier. Used by Soul Hound.

10602.name: Battle Manual - Soul Strike
10602.description: Spellbook needed to learn Soul Strike. Used by Soul Hound.

10603.name: Battle Manual - Betrayal Mark
10603.description: Spellbook needed to learn Betrayal Mark. Used by Trickster.

10604.name: Battle Manual - Rush Impact
10604.description: Spellbook needed to learn Rush Impact. Used by Doombringer.

10605.name: Battle Manual - Mass Disarm
10605.description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Disarm. Used by Doombringer.

10606.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Rudolph
10606.description: The bracelet which can summon cute Rudolph Agathion. No exchange/drop/use of freight available Rudolph Cuteness Trick

10607.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Rudolph
10607.description: The bracelet which can summon cute Rudolph Agathion. No exchange/drop/use of freight available

10608.name: Forgotten Scroll - Chant of Combat
10608.description: Scroll to learn Chant of Combat. Warcryer uses it. Can be acquired by level 70. Chant of Combat

10609.name: Forgotten Scroll - Chant of Critical
10609.description: Scroll to learn Chant of Critical Attack. Warcryer uses it. Can be acquired by level 72. Chant of Critical

10610.name: Forgotten Scroll - Chant of Blood Awakening
10610.description: Scroll to learn Chant of Blood Awakening. Warcryer uses it. Can be acquired by level 74. Chant of Blood Awakening

10611.name: Snow Fenrir Necklace
10611.description: The Necklace used to summon Snow Fenrir. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. Wolf's Necklace

10612.name: Certificate - Master Ability
10612.description: Certificate needed to learn a Master Ability. Only main classes can learn this skill. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse.

10613.name: Bird Nest (Event)
10613.description: Bird nest shaped hair accessory. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged for an event item or dropped.

10614.name: White Wool Hat (Event)
10614.description: Fun hair accessory that looks like a white sheep. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

10615.name: Black Wool Hat (Event)
10615.description: Fun hair accessory that looks like a black sheep. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

10616.name: Straw Hat (Event)
10616.description: Straw Hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. This event item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

10617.name: Ant Hat - Year 2008
10617.description: Fun hair accessory made with Monster Ant shape. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and exclusive for I-Card service, available until December 31, 2008(exchange, drop unavailable)

10618.name: Ol Mahum Hat - Year 2008
10618.description: Monster Ol Mahum shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and exclusive for I-Card service, available until December 31, 2008(exchange, drop unavailable)

10619.name: Wolf Hat - Year 2008
10619.description: Monster wolf shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and exclusive for I-Card service, available until December 31, 2008(exchange, drop unavailable)

10620.name: Shadow Item - Ant Hat - Blessed Scroll of Escape
10620.description: Monster Ant shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Blessed Escape

10621.name: Shadow Item - Ant Hat - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
10621.description: Monster Ant shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Blessed Resurrection

10622.name: Shadow Item - Ant Hat - Firework
10622.description: Monster Ant shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Large Fireworks Ability

10623.name: Shadow Item - Ant Hat - Big Head
10623.description: Monster Ant shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Mysterious Ability

10624.name: Shadow Item - Ol Mahum Hat - Blessed Scroll of Escape
10624.description: Monster Ol Mahum shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Blessed Escape

10625.name: Shadow Item - Ol Mahum Hat - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
10625.description: Monster Ol Mahum shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Blessed Resurrection

10626.name: Shadow Item - Ol Mahum Hat - Firework
10626.description: Monster Ol Mahum shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Large Fireworks Ability

10627.name: Shadow Item - Ol Mahum Hat - Big Head
10627.description: Monster Ol Mahum shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Mysterious Ability

10628.name: Shadow Item - Wolf Hat - Blessed Scroll of Escape
10628.description: Monster wolf shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Blessed Escape

10629.name: Shadow Item - Wolf Hat - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
10629.description: Monster wolf shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Blessed Resurrection

10630.name: Shadow Item - Wolf Hat - Firework
10630.description: Monster wolf shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Large Fireworks Ability

10631.name: Shadow Item - Wolf Hat - Big Head
10631.description: Monster wolf shaped hat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots and available to use active skill exclusive for I-Card service. (Exchange, drop unavailable) Mysterious Ability

10632.name: Wondrous Cubic
10632.description: Double-click to create a cube fragment that can be exchanged for a weapon/armor enchant scroll. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can only be used once per day.) TODO: Manage global (main class <-> subclasses) reuse for skills. Wondrous Cubic

10633.name: Cube Fragment Armor - D
10633.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a D-Grade Armor Enchant Scroll.

10634.name: Cube Fragment Armor - C
10634.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a C-Grade Armor Enchant Scroll.

10635.name: Cube Fragment Armor - B
10635.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a B-Grade Armor Enchant Scroll.

10636.name: Cube Fragment Armor - A
10636.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a A-Grade Armor Enchant Scroll.

10637.name: Cube Fragment Armor - S
10637.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a S-Grade Armor Enchant Scroll.

10638.name: Rough Black Cubic Piece
10638.description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper.

10639.name: Mouse Coin
10639.description: Currency used by Mutated Rats. Take it to a magic lab for a reward.

10640.name: Cloned Squash Seed
10640.description: Squish Your Squash Event - Double-click it and a Young Squash will appear. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. Squash Seed

10641.name: Cloned Large Squash Seed
10641.description: Squish Your Squash Event - Double-click it and a Large Young Squash will appear. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. Large Squash Seed

10642.name: Cube Fragment Weapon - D
10642.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a D-Grade Weapon Enchant Scroll.

10643.name: Cube Fragment Weapon - C
10643.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a C-Grade Weapon Enchant Scroll.

10644.name: Cube Fragment Weapon - B
10644.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a B-Grade Weapon Enchant Scroll.

10645.name: Cube Fragment Weapon - A
10645.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a A-Grade Weapon Enchant Scroll.

10646.name: Cube Fragment Weapon - S
10646.description: Speak with a warehouse keeper to exchange this for a S-Grade Weapon Enchant Scroll.

10647.name: Fine Black Cubic Piece
10647.description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper.

10649.name: Feather of Blessing
10649.description: Dimensional item. You can resurrect right away at the spot where you get killed if you have the Feather of Blessing. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant.

10650.name: Adventurer's Scroll of Escape
10650.description: Magic scroll that moves you to the nearest village. Item for beginner adventurers that cannot be exchanged or dropped. Adventurer's Scroll of Escape

10667.name: Sirra's Blade {PvP} - Haste
10667.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. PvP Weapon - CP Drain

10668.name: Sirra's Blade {PvP} - Health
10668.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. PvP Weapon - CP Drain

10669.name: Sirra's Blade {PvP} - Critical Poison
10669.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 15% chance of poisoning the target during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. PvP Weapon - CP Drain

10670.name: Sword of Ipos {PvP} - Focus
10670.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10671.name: Sword of Ipos {PvP} - Haste
10671.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10672.name: Sword of Ipos {PvP} - Health
10672.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10673.name: Barakiel's Axe {PvP} - Health
10673.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. PvP Weapon - CP Drain

10674.name: Barakiel's Axe {PvP} - Haste
10674.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. PvP Weapon - CP Drain

10675.name: Barakiel's Axe {PvP} - Focus
10675.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. PvP Weapon - CP Drain

10676.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork {PvP} - Focus
10676.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10677.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork {PvP} - Health
10677.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10678.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork {PvP} - Anger
10678.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement> . Decreases Max HP by 15% and P. Atk. increases by 32. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10679.name: Naga Storm {PvP} - Focus
10679.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 67. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. PvP Weapon - Cancel

10680.name: Naga Storm {PvP} - Critical Damage
10680.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 200 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. PvP Weapon - Cancel

10681.name: Naga Storm {PvP} - Back Blow
10681.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 37 when attacking a target from behind. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. PvP Weapon - Cancel

10682.name: Tiphon's Spear {PvP} - Critical Stun
10682.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 25% chance of stunning a target during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10683.name: Tiphon's Spear {PvP} - Towering Blow
10683.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases the attack range. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10684.name: Tiphon's Spear {PvP} - Wild Blow
10684.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Broadens the angle of attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. PvP Weapon - Attack Chance

10685.name: Shyeed's Bow {PvP} - Cheap Shot
10685.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 30% chance of decreasing MP Consumption to 1 during a normal attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. PvP Weapon - Rapid Fire

10686.name: Shyeed's Bow {PvP} - Focus
10686.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. PvP Weapon - Rapid Fire

10687.name: Shyeed's Bow {PvP} - Quick Recovery
10687.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Reduce re-use delay by 17%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. PvP Weapon - Rapid Fire

10688.name: Sobekk's Hurricane {PvP} - Rsk. Haste
10688.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 11% when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. PvP Weapon - Cancel

10689.name: Sobekk's Hurricane {PvP} - Haste
10689.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. PvP Weapon - Cancel

10690.name: Sobekk's Hurricane {PvP} - Critical Drain
10690.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Absorbs 14 HP from target during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. PvP Weapon - Cancel

10691.name: Themis' Tongue {PvP} - Mana Up
10691.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10692.name: Themis' Tongue {PvP} - Mental Shield
10692.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10693.name: Themis' Tongue {PvP} - Magic Focus
10693.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 20% chance of casting Focus when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10694.name: Cabrio's Hand {PvP} - Conversion
10694.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10695.name: Cabrio's Hand {PvP} - Mana Up
10695.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10696.name: Cabrio's Hand {PvP} - Magic Silence
10696.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10697.name: Daimon Crystal {PvP} - Mana Up
10697.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10698.name: Daimon Crystal {PvP} - Acumen
10698.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting

10699.name: Daimon Crystal {PvP} - Mental Shield
10699.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. PvP Weapon - Casting
